comment: An orthogonality relation for Dirichlet characters: the sum of all the values of a Dirichlet character ` X ` is ` 0 ` if ` X ` is non-principal and ` phi ( n ) ` otherwise. Part of Theorem 6.5.1 of [Shapiro] p. 230. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
